title: Rr scholarship
content: 21% in phy cycle and 23% in chem cycle have scored above 8.75 so does that mean the scholarship cutoffs will be somewhere around 9 for cnr

comments.body: Scholarships are given separately for each cycle so the cnr cutoffs would be less than 8.75 or equal to in both of the cycles..
it will be around 8.70 as you need to be in the top 25% to get cnr... btw RR's performance is massively better than EC
Bro, just read what you said once again and you'll realise the last part of this post you wrote is so incredibly stupid
WellÂ  i didn't know that the 25 % was from each cycle
9.4 usually, when i was in chem cycle mrd was 9.64+(1st sem) and p cycle was 9.4+(2nd sem)
